name: Karmic Ink.
description:
Churn out those souls and maximize karmic gain. Lets reach our quarterly targets, even if we have to break a few eggs along the way!

The karmic cycle on overdrive. Cupids have been automated away, and storks deliver babies day and night, but someone's got to make sure fresh souls are being safely fed in to the gaping maw of modern Civilization. The state of said civilization isn't really any of your business, and neither is workplace safety, so lets get some overtime and generate some more of that sweet, sweet karma.

How to Play:
Click on fresh souls(eggs) to imbue them with hope and  other paltry uplifting feelings. But not too much! Time it so the pesky birds don't damage the merchandise too badly, as that'll reflect badly on how much good they'll bring to the world. But a few dings here and there never hurt anyone, so long as you maximize karmic profits! Break a few too many eggs(souls) along the way too quickly, and don't be surprised if your Earth parallel goes up in flames and the Higher ups start breathing down your neck again though.

Submission for Bolt Jam #9 : Keep it Goin'
